attributes.action: Fast track Ukraine citizens into our country and out of their wartorn country.
attributes.additional_details: Every women and child that is raped and killed is on us.  We have the power to get them out.  We should set up a programme so that English citizens can opt in to help house the citizens; and the government should be making arrangements to help get all the women and children out of the country.
attributes.background: I want the government to end the suffering of all the women and children in Ukraine.  We may not be able to involve ourselves with troops, but we can certainly get the most vulnerable and targeted out of the country and to safety now! We should be air lifting them out if that is what it takes.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574

Grant Ukrainian citizens fleeing the war full rights to live and work in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609434

Urge UN to provide safe evacuation routes from war zone in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610069

Draw up and implement a specific Ukrainian refugee strategy for the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609431

Commit to providing refuge for at least 100,000 Ukrainian women & children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609565
